data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Samar.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Samar, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Samar, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Samar, Philippines know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Samar to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, Tagalog-speaking people.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Samar do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 545,059 believers in Samar to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.

data.section_summary:
the state of Samar, Philippines has a population of 3,912,900.

We estimate Samar has 545,059 people who might know Jesus, 3,014,322 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 353,519 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Samar, Philippines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
